mapper.select: WITH list AS ( SELECT am.idKey , am.grp , am.alimType , am.title , am.content , am.linkUrl , am.linkImageUrl , am.receiverIdKey , ur.userId as receiverUserId , am.receiveDate , am.senderIdKey , us.userId as senderUserId , up.nickName as senderNickName , up.imageUrl as senderImageUrl , am.sendDate , row_number() over(ORDER BY am.idKey desc) AS rnk , count(*) over() AS totalRows FROM fp_alim am left outer join fp_user ur on am.receiverIdKey = ur.idKey /*수신자*/ left outer join fp_user us on am.senderIdKey = us.idKey /*송신자*/ left outer join fp_user_profile up on am.senderIdKey = up.userIdKey /*송신자*/ WHERE am.receiverIdKey = #{receiverIdKey} AND am.grp = #{grp} ) SELECT list.* , (totalRows - rnk + 1) AS seq FROM list WHERE rnk BETWEEN #{frRow} AND #{toRow} ORDER BY rnk
SELECT st.userIdKey , st.myLookComment , st.myCommentComent , st.myCoolComment , st.followMe , st.coolMyLook , st.appNotice , st.appEvent FROM fp_alim_setting st WHERE userIdKey = #{userIdKey}
